<<<<<<< HEAD
The <info>%command.name%</info> command generates a new command:

<info>php %command.full_name% app:do-something</info>

If the argument is missing, the command will ask for the command name interactively.
=======
The <info>%command.name%</info> command generates a new command:

<info>php %command.full_name% app:do-something</info>

If the argument is missing, the command will ask for the command name interactively.
